issues.suggestion: Correct to "Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM)" instead of "United Arab Emirates Federal Courts".  The company is governed by the laws of the ADGM, not the UAE Federal Courts.
The Articles of Association must specify the authorized share capital.  The Board cannot determine this; it must be pre-defined.
issues.source_reference: ADGM Companies Regulations (Articles of Association template)

issues.suggestion: Obtain and include the official signatures of all shareholders as required by ADGM regulations.
issues.source_reference: ADGM Resolutions of Shareholders template and  Companies Regulations

issues.suggestion: Ensure the Articles of Association comply with the ADGM provided template or provide justification for any deviations, demonstrating compliance with the ADGM Companies Regulations.
issues.source_reference: ADGM Companies Regulations and available templates on www.registration.adgm.com
